thread.section_title: HelloFresh US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HelloFresh US | hellofresh.com | 23 of 288
thread.title: Leigh

author: Leigh
title: Leigh
text: I'm so glad my daughter shared Hello Fresh with us! I'd gotten into a serious rut with my weekly cooking. Hello Fresh has taken the "what am I cooking for dinner" dilemma out of our weeknights because I have the 3 Hello Fresh boxes in my refrigerator! The meals have been varied and of good quality. A bonus is that I am making fewer trips to the grocery store and as a result I'm sure I'm saving money!
